00188 template<class V, class T>
00189 SPtr<Node> Spatial<V,T>::clone() {
00190 
00191     SPtr<Node> clone(new Spatial<V,T>(this->name));
00192     clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Spatial<V,T> >())->localTransform->setTo(*localTransform);
00193 
00194     if(this->bounds.get()) {
00195         SPtr<BoundingVolume<V> > boundsClone(this->bounds->clone());
00196         clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Spatial<V,T> >())->setBounds(boundsClone);
00197     }
00198 
00199     return clone;
00200 }

00203 template<class V, class T>
00204 SPtr<Node> Spatial<V,T>::cloneTree(SPtr<Node>& parent) {
00205     
00206     SPtr<Node> clone(this->clone());
00207 
00208     //reparent clone
00209     if(parent.get()) {
00210         parent->attachChild(clone);
00211     }
00212 
00213     //recursively clone children
00214     for(int i=0; i<this->children->size(); i++) {
00215         this->children->get(i)->cloneTree(clone);
00216     }
00217 
00218     return clone;
00219 }
